links.*: Fées, navigateurs & autres miscellanées en Terre du Milieu
On cartography, maps & locations in Middle-earth
On some stars, flowers & places in Middle-earth

wikitext.*:
'''Didier Willis''' ([[25 April]], [[1971]]), a French IT engineer, is President of Le Dragon de Brume, a non-profit Tolkien association.<ref>[http://www.tolkienlibrary.com/press/1008-Le_Dragon_de_Brume.php Tolkien, le façonnement d'un monde] at [http://www.tolkienlibrary.com TolkienLibrary.com] (accessed 24 September)</ref> 

Before that, he wrote several articles and studies on Arda in the French [https://en.wiktionary.org/wiki/e-zine e-zine] ''[[Hiswelókë]]''. Amongs other things, he has compiled the [http://www.jrrvf.com/hisweloke/sindar/ Hiswelókë's Sindarin Dictionary] as well as the (now unmaintained) [[Dragon Flame]] application.

==Bibliography==

===Books===

*[[2011]]: ''[[Tolkien, le façonnement d'un monde]]'', volume 1, botany and astronomy (editor, co-author)
*[[2014]]: ''Tolkien, le façonnement d'un monde'', volume 2, astronomy and geography (editor, co-author)
*[[2017]]: ''[[Fées, navigateurs & autres miscellanées en Terre du Milieu]]'' (co-editor)
*[[2023]]: ''[[On some stars, flowers & places in Middle-earth]]'' (editor, main translator)
*[[2024]]: ''[[On cartography, maps & locations in Middle-earth]]'' (editor, main translator, co-author)
*2024: ''A bibliography of Tolkien studies in French & English'' (editor, permanent on-line publication)

===Articles===

*Critical reviews "Tolkien, ''From Quendi and Eldar'', Appendix D" (pp. 100–2), "Tolkien, ''Etymological Notes on the Ósanwe-kenta, From The Shibboleth of Fëanor, Notes on Óre''" pp. 104–6, in ''[[La Feuille de la Compagnie 1]], cahier d'études tolkieniennes'', [[Michaël Devaux]] (ed.), L'Œil du Sphinx, [[2001]].
*Encyclopedic notices "Alphabets inventés"; "L'Anneau de Morgoth (''Morgoth’s Ring'')", pp. 26–9 and 47-50 in [[Vincent Ferré]] (ed.), ''[[Dictionnaire Tolkien]]'', Paris, CNRS, [[2012]].
*"Parole et pensée chez Tolkien : l'analogie de l'angélologie" in ''[[La Feuille de la Compagnie 3]], J.R.R. Tolkien, l'Effigie des Elfes'', [[Michaël Devaux]] (ed.), Bragelonne, December [[2014]].
*"L'équivocité des conceptions valarine et elfique du "marrissement" d'Arda" in ''[[La Feuille de la Compagnie 3]], J.R.R. Tolkien, l'Effigie des Elfes'', [[Michaël Devaux]] (ed.), Bragelonne, December [[2014]].
